briefTitle: Weight Variation During Chemotherapy in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Weight Variation and Mechanisms Involved, During Chemotherapy in Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change from baseline in body composition
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* menopausal women
* breast cancer
* patients requiring chemotherapy treatment
* WHO performance status 0-2

Exclusion Criteria:

* diabetics
* patients with metastases
* other cancer
